name: Stick vs Stick (demo)
description:
Stick vs Stick is a 2D platform fighting game for windows where you play as stick figures drawn to life. You can play with up to 4 players or computers in local multiplayer matches. Gameplay consists of hectic tag team fights where you can call a support character to help you out. The game is very early so there's only one character to play as but I'm hoping to add additional characters over time.

You can play with either keyboard or controller but check out my blog post for in depth details on how to play.

Feel free to contact me about bugs using this email address: TravisJB101@gmail.com

If you want casual updates from time to time check out my Twitter.

Thanks for taking the time to check out my game and I hope you enjoy!!
